item.title: About
item.author: andreas@derosi.com (Andreas De Rosi)
item.description: Ciao! I’m Andreas De Rosi, a fun-loving Italian who’s been on quite the international adventure! ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ My journey began with studying in Austria and England, and eventually, I found myself living in India for an entire decade! ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ Nowadays, I split my time between Berlin, India, and the occasional trip to Chiang Mai, Thailand. It’s not just about the holidays, though! Chiang Mai is a fantastic place where I can connect with my SEO peers and collaborate on exciting projects.
